Title: TwiXaml
Description:
a twitter client built with WPF

Note: now supports oAuth.
HomeWiki:
Twixaml is basically a project we intended to do for fun when we started learning WCF and WPF. For a starting point we have implemented it using the Twitterizer library for C# but we will soon shift it to WCF completely. Features we are looking forward to include are:


*WCF based communication
*Cache (so that we dont run in rate limit)


interested in helping us out? feel free :)
